title: Master Class on Information Extraction Based on Large Language Models

learning_goals: Learners can build an LLM (Large Language Model) specialized for information extraction tasks by fine-tuning parameters under 500MB using the PEFT (Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning) technique.
Learners can design a conversion mechanism between structured output formats (e.g., IOB, XML) and natural language output with over 90% accuracy.
Learners can execute an information extraction model training pipeline within 24 hours in a resource-constrained computing environment.
